group_1.textLeft: The Union and Promised Blood are about to have@their final battle, you say...?
Akira and Meiyui, you're both in the Union.
Do you not need to participate in the fight?

group_1.textRight: We were not chosen as combatants by the@[textYellow:Kimochi].
So this battle will be focused on only the people@who were selected.

group_1.textLeft: Hm, I see...
However, that rule laid out by the [textYellow:Kimochi]@is somewhat unreliable, isn't it?
Despite what the [textYellow:Kimochi] say, we don't know what@the Witch they came from is thinking.
If they can make up rules on a whim,@then they can take them away just as quickly...

group_1.textRight: ...I hope Felicia and her friends don't get@pushed around too much...

group_1.textLeft: We have been dragged into this as well.
Promised Blood had originally sworn
to kill all Magical Girls in Kamihama City, no?
While the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s rule helps us,@we are still in danger...

group_1.textRight: And they know where we all live,
so there's no tellin' what could happen...

group_1.textLeft: Nanaka and Kako may not be part of the Union,
but Promised Blood is merciless towards@any Magical Girls from our city.
On that note, I've heard from Meiyui...
That Shizuku Hozumi from the Union@may be a target due to her unique magic.

group_1.textRight: Her ability, "spatial binding"...@allows for instantaneous travel.
Unsurprisingly, the enemy is wary of her.@We cannot say this is only a stranger's affair.

group_1.textLeft: Given all of this, it's not safe for us to stay in@Kamihama City, is it?

group_1.textRight: You have a point... It's frustrating, but if the@final battle's gonna be in Futatsugi,
then we can't do anything about it here@in Kamihama...
Do you have any ideas about where else we could go,@though?

group_1.textLeft: ...I can think of one place we could stay,@using my connections to the Blue Seas Family.

group_1.textRight: Is it someone you're close with... Meiyui?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. A long time ago,@we had once competed against each other.
But now we have a good relationship where we help@each other out instead.
They are a mutual aid organization in their city,@much like the Blue Seas Family.
I'm certain they will allow us shelter.
Where might this organization be located?
